script:
# script "lisp"
# body 500532
# pos 500532 3
# scale 500532 0.8 0
# mask 500532 off
# body 500535
# pos 500535 5
# scale 500535 0.8 0
# alpha 500535 0 0
# mask 500535 off
# body 400831
# pos 400831 3
# scale 400831 0.8 0
# alpha 400831 0 0
# mask 400831 off
# body 400834
# pos 400834 1
# scale 400834 0.8 0
# alpha 400834 0 0
# mask 400834 off
# bgm "bgm036" 0
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# background "ancient_back"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
ヴァジュラ[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500532 0 0
# alpha 500535 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 500535 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 5005 "vajura_kyara_0020"
# waitandnext 2.2

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500535 1 0
# move 500535 3 0
# scale 500535 0.8 0
# envbody 1001 11 0
# effectpattern 1001 2 0
# effectstart 1001
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 5005 "vajura_kyara_0014"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@ヴァジュラ
見たかい？
失敗は成功のもとってことだね！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1001
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# alpha 500535 0 0
# alpha 400831 1 0
# background "ancient_back"
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
オティヌス[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 400831 0 0
# alpha 400834 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 400834 4 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 4008 "otyinusu_kyara_0015"
# waitandnext 2.4

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 400834 1 0
# move 400834 3 0
# scale 400834 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 4008 "otyinusu_kyara_0020"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@オティヌス
んん～♪
これで、少しは強く
見えるようになったかな？

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 400834 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 24
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！
